devdoc.details: MarketFactory modified to create futarchy proposals. Each proposal has four outcomes (Yes/Token1, Yes/Token2, No/Token1, No/Token2). There's one reality question asking whether or not the proposal should be accepted. If the proposal is accepted, the first two outcomes (Yes) are redeemable, otherwise, the last two are redeemable (No).

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

NewProposal(address,string,bytes32,bytes.details: To be emitted when a new proposal is created.

allMarkets().details: Returns all the proposals created by this factory.

params._arbitrator: Address of the arbitrator that is going to resolve Realitio disputes.
params._proposal: Address of the proposal contract that is going to be used for each new deployment.

createProposal((string,address,address,s.details: Creates the Proposal and deploys the wrapped ERC20 tokens.

marketsCount().notice: Returns the total number of proposals created by this factory.
